name: blog-hugo
description: Henrik's blog using static site engine Hugo

scripts.js:watch: onchange scripts -- npm run js:build && npm run index
scripts.build:assets: npm run clean && npm run js:build:prod
scripts.start: npm run js:build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run js:watch" "npm run hugo:watch"
scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run clean:public && hugo version && hugo --gc && npm run index:prod
scripts.test: npm run build && start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:1313 cypress:open
scripts.test:ci: npm run build && start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:1313 cypress:cli

author: Henrik Sommerfeld
